title: Fort Bowie National Historic Site: History & Culture
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture             History & Culture       Fort Bowie was the focal point for military actions by the US Army against the Chiricahua Apaches for over 20 years. The artifacts, ruins, and written documentation leave a rich historical record. Learn more about the stories and people that make Fort Bowie National Historical Site so important to the American West.  Â     Fort Bowie, 1886
